title: Remove selected UI element at provided XPath

requirements.text: Remove the UI element that corresponds to the selected XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]` from the rendered page, ensuring only this specific element is removed and all surrounding layout/content continues to render normally.

quotes:
Can you please remove this element?

<selected-elements>
Element 1:
- XPath:
/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]
</selected-elements>

acceptanceCriteria: The DOM node at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]` is no longer present after the change.
No other UI elements outside the selected XPath are removed or visually altered (other than natural reflow from removing this element).
The page renders without runtime errors or console errors after the element removal.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the element identified by the provided XPath; do not remove or modify other elements.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the page or adjust styling beyond what is necessary as a direct consequence of removing the selected element.
Do not change backend logic or Internet Identity/auth flow behavior.
